text: The Way to the Gold is a 1957 American drama movie directed by Robert D. Webb and was based on the 1955 novel of the same name by Wilbur Daniel Steele. It stars Jeffrey Hunter, Sheree North, Barry Sullivan, Walter Brennan, Neville Brand, Jacques Aubuchon, Ruth Donnelly and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. == Other websites == * * Category:1957 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Robert D. Webb
title: The Way to the Gold
